article_title: People are just the worst: Fan tailgates wearing Adrian Peterson jersey and carrying a switch
article_text:
Topics: Adrian Peterson, Kim JOhnson, minnesota vikings, Life News

Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson was indicted late last week on a charge of beating his young son with a switch.

So what did this fan, spotted at a Vikings game today by Kim Johnson, a Minneapolis TV anchor at WCCO, decide to wear to the stadium?

That’s right: A Peterson shirt and a switch.

Here's a pic. pic.twitter.com/EYY3Woulwm — Kim Johnson (@KimJohnsonWCCO) September 14, 2014

article_metadata.description: What the hell is wrong with people....
